text: Tumi dekhate pabe an'yayakarira bhita-santrasta rayeche tara ya arjana kareche se jan'ya, ara ta tadera upare parate'i yacche. Paksantare yara imana eneche o satkarma karache jannatera phulamaya mayadane, -- tadera jan'ya tadera prabhura kache rayeche tara ya caya ta'i. E'iti -- e'i'i to hacche birata karunabhandara.
